text: ‘Muxun naxanye n ma layirin kalaxi, naxanye mɔn mi tin layirin nakamalɛ e yɛtɛɛn naxan xidi n yɛtagi, n na e suxuma nɛn alo e ɲinge diin naxan yisɛgɛn firinna ra, e yi dangu a dungine tagi layiri xidin dangan misaala ra.34.18 Mɛn kaane yi xuruseni sɛgɛma nɛn firinna ra, e yi dangu a dungi firinne tagi layirin misaala ra fa fala xa naxan mi layirin nakamali, na kanna xa liga alo xuruseen naxan yisɛgɛxi ito ra. Na feen sɛbɛxi Dunuɲa Fɔlɔn 15.9-18 kui.
